sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们需要加快工作进度。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào jiākuài gōngzuò jìndù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons accélérer le rythme de travail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need to speed up the work progress.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Liǎng guó jiànlì le wàijiāo guānxi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les deux pays ont établi des relations diplomatiques.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The two countries established diplomatic relations.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào jiāqiáng ānquán cuòshī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons renforcer les mesures de sécurité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need to strengthen security measures.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ hěn xiǎngniàn wǒ de jiāxiāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ma ville natale me manque beaucoup.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I miss my hometown very much.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这件衣服的价钱很合理。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn yīfu de jiàqian hěn hélǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le prix de ce vêtement est raisonnable.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The price of this clothing is reasonable.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī gè jiānqiáng de nǚrén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle est une femme forte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is a strong woman.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè fú huà yǒu hěn gāo de jiàzhí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce tableau a une grande valeur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This painting has great value.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ yào jiānchí zìjǐ de mèngxiǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu dois persévérer dans tes rêves.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should persist in your dreams.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他在比赛中获得了金牌。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài bǐsài zhōng huòdé le jīnpái.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a remporté la médaille d'or à la compétition.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He won the gold medal in the competition.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā jiěkāi le zhège mí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a résolu cette énigme.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He solved this puzzle.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这本教材很适合初学者。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè běn jiàocái hěn shìhé chūxuézhě.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce manuel est très adapté aux débutants.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This textbook is very suitable for beginners.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng dào qiántái jiāofèi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez payer à l'accueil.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please pay at the front desk.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīnnián de chéngjì jiào qùnián hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les résultats de cette année sont meilleurs que l'année dernière.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This year's results are better than last year.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào jiéyuē yòng shuǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons économiser l'eau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We should save water.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们必须解决这个问题。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen bìxū jiějué zhège wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons résoudre ce problème.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We must solve this problem.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī jiàn jiù yīfu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un vieux vêtement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is an old piece of clothing.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Hǎojiǔ bù jiàn le!
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ça fait longtemps qu'on ne s'est pas vus !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Long time no see!

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jìnqī tiānqì biànhuà hěn dà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le temps a beaucoup changé récemment.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The weather has changed a lot recently.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè chǎng biǎoyǎn fēicháng jīngcǎi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette représentation était merveilleuse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This performance was wonderful.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōngguó jīngjì fāzhǎn hěn kuài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'économie chinoise se développe rapidement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: China's economy is developing rapidly.
